00068 /*************************************************************************/
00073 /*************************************************************************/
00074 void InitializeMainMenu(void)
00075 {
00076         // Reset the object list
00077         resetObjectList();
00078 
00079         // Create the start button
00080         StartButton = CreateSprite("Start Button", "TextureFiles/StartButton.png", 480.0f, 180.0f, 1, 1, 1);
00081         StartButton->Position.x = 0.0f;
00082         StartButton->Position.y = 200.0f;
00083 
00084         // Creates the showcase button
00085         ShowcaseButton = CreateSprite("Showcase Button", "TextureFiles/ShowcaseButton.png", 640.0f, 180.0f, 1, 1, 1);
00086         ShowcaseButton->Position.x = 0.0f;
00087         ShowcaseButton->Position.y = 0.0f;
00088 
00089         // Creates the exit button
00090         ExitButton = CreateSprite("Exit Button", "TextureFiles/ExitButton.png", 480.0f, 180.0f, 1, 1, 1);
00091         ExitButton->Position.x = 0.0f;
00092         ExitButton->Position.y = -200.0f;
00093 
00094         // Creates the selector button - set to default position of the start button
00095         Selector = CreateSprite("Selector", "TextureFiles/Selector.png", 500.0f, 200.0f, 0, 1, 1);
00096         Selector->Position.x = 100.0f;
00097         Selector->Position.y = 0.0f;
00098         
00099         // Set camera to (0,0)
00100         ResetCamera();
00101         UpdateSelector(Selector);
00102 }

00149 /*************************************************************************/
00154 /*************************************************************************/
00155 void InputHandling(void)
00156 {
00157         // check if forcing the application to quit
00158         if (AEInputCheckTriggered(VK_UP) || AEInputCheckTriggered('W'))
00159         {
00160                 if(selectedButton == 0)
00161                         selectedButton = numMenuButtons - 1;
00162                 else
00163                         selectedButton--;
00164 
00165                 UpdateSelector(Selector);
00166         }
00167         else if(AEInputCheckTriggered(VK_DOWN) || AEInputCheckTriggered('S'))
00168         {
00169                 if(selectedButton == numMenuButtons - 1)
00170                         selectedButton = 0;
00171                 else
00172                         selectedButton++;
00173 
00174                 UpdateSelector(Selector);
00175         }
00176         else if(AEInputCheckTriggered(VK_RETURN) || AEInputCheckTriggered(VK_SPACE))
00177         {
00178                 // Play le gaem
00179                 if(selectedButton == 0)
00180                         SetNextState(GS_TestLevel);
00181                 // Showcase button
00182                 else if(selectedButton == 1)
00183                         SetNextState(GS_ShowcaseLevel);
00184                 // Exit button
00185                 else if(selectedButton == 2)
00186                         SetNextState(GS_Quit);
00187         }
00188 
00189         // check if forcing the application to quit
00190         if (AEInputCheckTriggered(VK_ESCAPE) || 0 == AESysDoesWindowExist())
00191                 SetNextState(GS_Quit);
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*************************************************************************/
00202 /*************************************************************************/
00203 void UpdateSelector(struct Sprite *Selector)
00204 {
00205         switch(selectedButton)
00206         {
00207                 case 0:
00208                         Selector->Position = StartButton->Position;
00209                         Selector->Width = 500;
00210                         UpdateMesh(Selector);
00211                         break;
00212                 case 1:
00213                         Selector->Position = ShowcaseButton->Position;
00214                         Selector->Width = 660;
00215                         UpdateMesh(Selector);
00216                         break;
00217                 case 2:
00218                         Selector->Position = ExitButton->Position;
00219                         Selector->Width = 500;
00220                         UpdateMesh(Selector);
00221                         break;
00222                 default:
00223                         Selector->Position = StartButton->Position;
00224                         Selector->Width = 500;
00225                         UpdateMesh(Selector);
00226                         break;
00227         }
00228 }
